These are common sense bills Congress can pass to restore faith in American democracy. I look forward to working with my colleagues in the House to move these bills to the floor without delay.

Third, a resolution recognizing that the Supreme Court misinterpreted the 1st Amendment in the case of Buckley v. Valeo, which equated campaign spending with free speech and cleared the way for foreign and special interests to funnel dark money through 501(c)(4) organizations.

Second, a bill requiring TV stations to grant 2 hours of free advertising to each qualified federal or statewide candidate. This would help level the playing field for viable candidates running against campaigns bankrolled by special interests.

First, I am introducing a Constitutional Amendment to repeal Citizens United and grant Congress and the States the power to establish limits on contributions and expenditures in elections for public office.
Today, I am introducing three bills get dark money out of politics, reform to our electoral system, and restore the American people’s power over our democracy. https://bit.ly/2RtMymP

The innovation-driven Dept. of @Energy is our greatest asset when it comes to protecting our environment and improving energy and water infrastructure, that's why I will work tirelessly to ensure the @POTUS's shortsighted efforts to gut the Dept & its programs are kept in check.

As Chairwoman, I will work closely with my colleagues to support further innovation @ENERGY and the jobs that comes from it, shore up energy and water infrastructure to bolster commerce and jobs, and promote comprehensive solutions to the challenges facing our Great Lakes.

This is an honor I owe to the people of Ohio’s 9th Congressional District. I look forward to working with YOU to support innovation and improve quality of life not only in northern Ohio, but to the full extent of our Committee’s reach.
